text:
Aly Mahmoud Lotfy (6 October 1935 – 27 May 2018) was an Egyptian politician. He served as Prime Minister of Egypt from 4 September 1985 to 9 November 1986 during the Hosni Mubarak presidency. He was born in Al-Adwa, Faiyum, Egypt. He was a member of the National Democratic Party.
Mahmoud died on 27 May 2018 in Cairo at the age of 82.
